name: The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s
description:
Help Adam, Barry, and Erica Goldberg get to the top of their school’s “Cool List” and become the most popular kids in town!

Based on the hit comedy TV show, The Goldbergs is an idle game where you build your popularity by managing the social life of a teenager in the 80s.

Tap to collect Cool Points, get Friends, and become totally popular! Upgrade your hangouts to get cool quickly and become the top of the teenage food chain in Jenkintown!

As the true king or queen of the social ladder, you'll collect characters straight from the TV show to help generate coolness and open new hangouts. Get new characters by collecting cards, then level them up by collecting VHS tapes, arcade tokens, and sunglasses!

Coolness is key to completing the popularity challenges and climbing the Cool List! But don't get too comfortable at the top - your beloved "smother" Beverly is always trying to "help" and one wrong step will get your embarrassed by your parents. You'll go from ruling the mall to hiding out in the computer lab faster than you can say "gag me with a spoon"!

Tap your way through boss fights against Beverly, Murray, and even Coach Mellor. As hard as you try to be cool, you'll lose it all at the end of each episode. But don’t have a cow, you’ll be rewarded with some choice 80s nostalgia to decorate your bedroom!

AN IDLE ADVENTURE WITH NEVER ENDING FUN
Follow hilarious characters through comedic cutscenes with plotlines and characters straight from the tv show. Even better - new stories are always being added!

MAKE FRIENDS AND GET POPULAR
Build and manage activities alongside Jenkintown's radical residents. From classic 80s activities like Hanging at the Mall or watching The Big Game to others straight from “The Goldbergs” TV show like Smashball and 80s Movie Parodies!

IDLE TYCOON FUN
Too lazy to work? No duh, so are we! Join in the idle game fun when you collect cards and characters to automate your hangouts. The game plays itself while you're away! Become a true idle tycoon.

Join the The Goldbergs' Adam, Erica, and Barry on a quest to be cool and relive a world of acid-washed jeans, giant cell phones, and huge hair!
